entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Wet snow mixed with rain ending early this evening then cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of wet snow or rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023
